duties_responsibilities.duty: Create dynamic and cost-effective deliverables for traditional advertising and digital campaigns
Produce and manage direct marketing initiatives including direct mail materials and digital campaign assets
Contribute to completion of creative and advertising projects including concept, design, and final delivery
Coordinate with the creative and advertising team on pending and upcoming projects, and tracking of time
Respond to requests regarding creative, advertising, and promotional needs
Provide courteous and efficient customer service to internal customers
Understand and comply with bank policy, laws, and regulations

education_certification.credential: Associate's degree in Communications, Marketing, Graphic design, related field or equivalent relevant experience
